StringTable.Label: VolcanicRifts_Name
StringTable.String: Volcanic Rifts

StringTable.Label: VolcanicRifts_Dec
StringTable.String: Heat from below the surface can be extracted to power production.

StringTable.Label: FloatingMountains_Name
StringTable.String: Floating Mountains

StringTable.Label: FloatingMountains_Dec
StringTable.String: Studying these bizarre mountains could assist in research.

StringTable.Label: IsolatedBiome_Name
StringTable.String: Isolated Biome

StringTable.Label: IsolatedBiome_Dec
StringTable.String: The unique flora and fauna of this region will benefit research.

StringTable.Label: FluorescentForests_Name
StringTable.String: Fluorescent Forests

StringTable.Label: FluorescentForests_Dec
StringTable.String: The natural glow of the trees in this forest are a gorgeous sight for tourists.

StringTable.Label: NutrientRichLand_Name
StringTable.String: Nutrient Rich Land

StringTable.Label: NutrientRichLand_Dec
StringTable.String: The rich nutrients in the soil will support a thriving population.

StringTable.Label: Ravine_Name
StringTable.String: Ravine

StringTable.Label: Ravine_Dec
StringTable.String: The stunning views of this region will attract tourists.

StringTable.Label: VaporMines_Name
StringTable.String: Vapor Mines

StringTable.Label: VaporMines_Dec
StringTable.String: These mines can be extracted to provide a handsome wealth bonus.

StringTable.Label: PermanentRainbow_Name
StringTable.String: Permanent Rainbow

StringTable.Label: PermanentRainbow_Dec
StringTable.String: The beautiful rainbow improves the mood of the local populace.

StringTable.Label: Auroras_Name
StringTable.String: Auroras

StringTable.Label: Auroras_Dec
StringTable.String: Auroras fill the sky here and captivate all who see it.

StringTable.Label: BeastsOfBurden_Name
StringTable.String: Beasts Of Burden

StringTable.Label: BeastsOfBurden_Dec
StringTable.String: These local creatures could be put to work and assist the colonists.

StringTable.Label: GiantMushrooms_Name
StringTable.String: Giant Mushrooms

StringTable.Label: GiantMushrooms_Dec
StringTable.String: These freakishly large mushrooms present a generous food source.

StringTable.Label: UndergroundRelics_Name
StringTable.String: Underground Relics

StringTable.Label: UndergroundRelics_Dec
StringTable.String: Claiming these precious relics will extend influence.

StringTable.Label: PristineLakes_Name
StringTable.String: Pristine Lakes

StringTable.Label: PristineLakes_Dec
StringTable.String: The clear lakes sustain extensive water life and are ripe for fishing.

StringTable.Label: GoldFields_Name
StringTable.String: Gold Fields

StringTable.Label: GoldFields_Dec
StringTable.String: Fields rich with precious gold, will enrich whoever mines it.

StringTable.Label: ImpactCrater_Name
StringTable.String: Impact Crater

StringTable.Label: ImpactCrater_Dec
StringTable.String: Studying this site could reveal insight about the history of this world.

StringTable.Label: UnstableMaterials_Name
StringTable.String: Unstable Materials

StringTable.Label: UnstableMaterials_Dec
StringTable.String: Undiscovered materials that could be deadly if weaponised on fleets.

StringTable.Label: RestorativeHerbs_Name
StringTable.String: Restorative Herbs

StringTable.Label: RestorativeHerbs_Dec
StringTable.String: The restorative power of these herbs can be used for medical treatments.

StringTable.Label: ThrivingReef_Name
StringTable.String: Thriving Reef

StringTable.Label: ThrivingReef_Dec
StringTable.String: The abundant reef in the surrounding oceans is a magical sight to behold.
